project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Pension Reform Project is to assist China reform its pension system, through sustainable funding strategies. Also, the project aims at improving the pension system in a pilot province and city, so as to obtain experience and develop templates for the establishment of a national unified pension system. To this end, an actuarial model will be developed, to assess the financial viability of the Qingdao municipal, and, the Heilongjiang provincial pension systems, in accordance with existing parameters. The project components will include: 1) policy development, and, regulation drafting regarding pension reform issues; 2) development of sustainable funding strategies for the municipal and provincial pilot pension systems; 3) update and revision of information, and related administrative systems, both at the Ministry of Labor and Social Security (MOLSS), and the municipal and provincial pilots' labor bureaus, through the installation of automated systems for greater capacity and processing efficiency; 4) training, to support the enhancement of personnel skills requirements, which will include areas such as, pension management and reform policy, financial projections, and, pension asset management; 5) assistance in project administration at the level of MOLSS and pilot project units, supporting costs, such as, personnel, internal travel expenses, printing, communications, translation, and related expenses.

P058308.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>养老金体制改革技术援助项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是协助中国通过可持续的筹资战略开展养老金体制改革，在一个试点省和试点市完善养老金制度，为建立全国统一的养老金体系积累经验并建立模版。为实现这一目标，将开发一套保险统计模型，根据现有参数对青岛市和黑龙江省养老金制度的财务可行性进行评估。本项目的具体内容包括：（1）制定养老金体制改革方面的政策，草拟相关法规；（2）为试点省和试点市的养老金体制改革制定具有可持续性的筹资战略；（3）通过安装容量更大且处理效率更高的自动化系统，更新并修订信息及相关行政管理制度。这项工作将在劳动和社会保障部以及试点省和试点市的劳动和社会保障厅局层面开展；（4）开展培训，为提高人员技能要求提供支撑。培训内容包括养老金管理和改革政策、财务预测及养老金资产管理；（5）针对劳动和社会保障部及试点项目单位的项目管理工作提供援助，包括援助人员费用、国内差旅费、印刷费、通讯费、翻译费及其它相关费用。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
